cause.description:
We want to help educate the world one person at a time. with the right information, sexual assault can be prevented or at least the numbers can be greatly reduced. these people are our mothers our brothers our friends our family. Dont let it happen to you.
1. Sexual Assault is never your fault.
2. Sexual Assault can happen to anyone.
3. Knowledge is your greatest weapon.
cause.mission: educate those who have gone without information so that it doesnt happen to them.
cause.name: A.S.A.P Association for Sexual Assault Prevention
